artist: Author: Andre Hewitt; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume, illlustration of a person writing in a notebook, with illustrations of four punk figures and a city in separate panels behind them; 200 pp.
inscription: Title page, black ink pen: Fly.... / Fuck shit up!! / Please / peop me / some day / And enjoy my former dyke / days!! / xxo / Andre/ / Urban Hermitt
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Urban Hermitt: The Flow Chronicles
